title: DigitalMonk
author: DigitalMonk
content: Bitcoinism is a kind of new Religion. It is a financial religion, where, some one said, Satoshi Nakamoto is a Horse. Imagine, Satoshi Nakamoto is a Horse with one Horn. It is Unicorn. If you imagine Satoshi Nakamoto with two horns, he will look like Bull or Baffalow. If Satoshi Nakamoto is Just with Three horns, he will be look like God Jupiter with his Triton. If, one can imagine Satoshi Nakamoto with his Samurai Sword, it will make him Supream God of Nippon. If Satoshi Nakamoto is an Alien, that will make him an Angel. Ange mean anger and El mean Elohim. But if Satoshi Nakamoto is White Horse with two wings, he Pegaseus the Father God of Zeus. Now, most of the people sow how believe and worship God to hgo to heaven after death.  If Bitcoinism is a religion, it need a Paradise like Utopia. Where all the Faithful Bitcoin believers will go there to enjoy life with prawn cocktails and champaign not after their death but right now here on this earth. If some one think that Satoshi Nakamoto mined the Block #1 after Six Days and he was pretending to be God who has descended to bring Economic justice in the world then What is wrong ?  All the prophets were send down to the earth to guide mankind learning way of religious ethics to help each others, like wise Satoshi Nakamoto is Horse who has descended to this earth from Niburu with a mission Bitcoinism. This is the Dispensation, " Hearken O people , poor and humble, greedy and thieves, " there is no religion except Bitcoinism and Satoshi Nakamoto is God of Money" when you recite it, you become a bitcoiner. You then eligible to enter the Inner Circle to meet Satoshi Nakamoto to get his further blessing. You will become rich and never get hungry.  360 Commandments1. Thou shall not Fork Bitcoin, he who fork Bitcoin shall be forked and it will be cryptographocally register in the Blockchain. 2. Thou shall not scam any one to make profit. 3. Thou shall not impersonate Satoshi Nakamoto. 4. Thou shall not cheat thy own Bitcoiners. 5. Thou shall keep Blockchain clean from bugs and virus.

comments.author: hatshepsut93
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on August 21, 2022, 01:26:26 PMBitcoinism is a kind of new Religion.No it's not. Full stop. Religion is a belief in supernatural forces. There's nothing like that in Bitcoin community. No one believes that Satoshi is a god. In fact most people don't think about Satoshi at all. He is a part of Bitcoin's history rather than the present. It's mostly the newbies who are fascinated with his mystery rather than the experienced bitcoiners, because experienced bitcoiners know that Bitcoin is an idea and a community project, rather than Satoshi's property.
